name: SVGGeometryElement.isPointInStroke
description: The SVGGeometryElement.isPointInStroke() method determines whether a given point is within the stroke shape of an element. Normal hit testing rules apply; the value of the pointer-events property on the element determines whether a point is considered to be within the stroke. The point argument is interpreted as a point in the local coordiante system of the element.

refs.name: Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 2
refs.description: The definition of 'SVGGeometryElement.isPointInStroke()' in the 'Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 2' specification.
